extendedInfo.description: Play the card game Euchre on your android phone. Compete with your partner to make your bid or euchre your opponent.Please send any feedback of this beta to support@bytesequencing.com1.0.3 fixes crash when playing stick the dealer1.0.1 fixes some droid drawing issues and a crash

reviews.title: What\'s going on?
reviews.comment: had & loved this game forever now all of a sudden SUPER GLITCHY ! Freezes, doesn\'t tell what happened in last hand  missing parts of screen please fix
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Got crappy cards every hand. Doesn\'t allow for change of cards when you get the or more 9 & 10s.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Not the best but it works. Partner is an idiot all the time. If you don\'t call trump then you\'ll most likely be euchred
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: There are many gliches, and partner plays wrong, and goes alone way too often, skips your deal sometimes, the game does have potiential though.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Computer players are not very intelligent. They make bad moves. Also, sometimes the game forces me to play two cards on one trick. -Backflip
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: What a joke. Who leads trump first all the time? What rules are being played? Uninstall.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Loner
reviews.comment: Way to many loner hands, at least 2 per game. Also patter will play a nine, instead of using his ace after trump is out.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Hate
reviews.comment: It was good until I got screwed on a alone hand that would\'ve gotten me 4 points. Taking 2 cards from some players in one draw.  Stupid
reviews.author: Sara Headlee

reviews.title: Euchre
reviews.comment: Locks up and doesn\'t always allow you to pass bid as it just stops for an indefinite amount of time.I
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: It cheats, even when you have a perfect hand it will sometimes play 2 cards at once & you get Euchred. The only updates were for advertising.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Bugs galore
reviews.comment: AI partner plays without strategy. Pop-ups don\'t show anymore. Non-playable since last update.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work on ICS
reviews.comment: Buggy on ICS, pop ups don\'t display. Can\'t continue when have to discard after picking up. Have played this for years on my OG Droid, but needs tuned again.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: this games IA is unbelievable dumb. Who goes alone and takes the first 3 tricks, then throws a 9 of clubs while also holding the ace of clubs.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Made by someone with mediocre euchre skills at nest
reviews.comment: Computer trumps partner. Throws low cards and thus points rather than lead with ace. Throws low cards and points rather than lead with the bauers. Calls trump with only single non bauer card and therefore always gets euchred. And the only thing more sad than that is i\'ve tried all the free euchre aps on here and this one is the best. So either i am the worlds greatest euchre player, which i definately am not, or the makers of these euchre aps just reallu suck.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Computer is stupid.
reviews.comment: The AI ie so stupid.  Leading 10 when they have aces and leading the left alone.  Stupid. Stupid. Stupid.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Basic euchre
reviews.comment: The computer plays like an idiot.. always pulls trump.. misplays every hand..the computer literally plays the game like a novice and there is no adjusting computer partner play.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Do Not Download!
reviews.comment: Its like the programmers knew the rules of the game, but not the strategies! My robot partner threw off suit when it had 10, Q, K in trump!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I have a hard time seeing the cards. Can you make the cards larget or at least easier to make out which suit is which.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This is a good game for people who want to improve their Euchre skills if they are beginners.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great but not as great as Spades
reviews.comment: PLEASE fix the AI so that when going solo, it doesn\'t hold a good card till the end, even if it\'s the same suit as the penultimate card in its hand (which it will then play first and almost always be defeated because of).  Also, the suit bidding buttons are invisible most of the time on my device.  Why not just use the same basic code that was used for Spades for all of the games?
reviews.author: A Google User
